title: Bug
body: I just played a match with champion I never got chest with and my teammate got a S. Why didn't I get a chest ? Is it a bug? Or is their something else I am missing for getting a chest?

replies.body: If you have already gotten a chest on the champion you are playing you cannot get another chest on that champ this season. You can check which champs you have gotten a chest on in the champion viewing section of your profile. Hope this helps :)
In addition to what the others wrote, the teammate also needs to be in your premade.

Most likely you may have already received your chest for that champion this season. You can always double check the requirements for those chests on our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233).
